resources.string: Q1. How to pass the data between activities in Android?
An Intent is used to connect one activity to another activity and having a message passing mechanism between activities.
Q2. What are the layouts available in android?
Android is having Linear Layout(Horizontal and Vertical), Frame Layout, Table Layout, and Relative Layout.
Q3. What are the return values of onStartCommand() in android services?

START_STICKY − If android stops services forcefully, using with START_STICKY, it can be restarted automatically without the user interaction. START_NOT_STICKY − If android stops services forcefully, it will not restart services till user start services. START_REDELIVER_INTENT − If android stops services forcefully, it will restart services by re- sending an intent.
Q4. How many applications are there in a given task in android?
The task is a collaboration of applications. It contains one or more applications in it
Q5. What is an anonymous class in android?
A class that does not have a name but have functionalities in it
Anonymous class doesn\'t have class name but has some functionalities in it
Q6. What is APK in android?
APK is an android packaging kit. We can pack/zip, our code in apk format to work on Android devices as an application.
Q7. What does httpclient.execute() returns in android?
Httpclient.execute() executes only once and it will return http response from the server or device, Http entity is embedded the body of the Http response.
Q8. What is the HTTP response error code status in android?
HTTP status code >= 400 means error else success. Status code 404 means page not found
Q9. Why don\'t we give MIN SDK as 1 in android?
Android version 2.2 is deprecated so we don\'t need to call MIN version to be 1
Q10. Can a class be immutable in android?
Can\'t make the class as final class

string-array.name: questionReview
string-array.item: Q1. How to pass the data between activities in Android? \n \n ANS: Intent
Q2. What are the layouts available in android \n \n ANS: All of the above
Q3. What are the return values of onStartCommand() in android services? \n \n ANS: All of the above
Q4. How many applications are there in a given task in android? \n \n ANS: Many
Q5. What is an anonymous class in android? \n \n ANS: A class that does not have a name but have functionalities in it
Q6. What is APK in android? \n \n ANS: Android packaging kit
Q7. What does httpclient.execute() returns in android? \n \n ANS: Http response
Q8. What is the HTTP response error code status in android? \n \n ANS: status >= 400
Q9. Why don\'t we give MIN SDK as 1 in android? \n \n ANS: Android deprecated version
Q10. Can a class be immutable in android? \n \n ANS: Yes, Class can be immutable
